#### Scraping

https://usac.climb8a.com/event/6926

 boulder

```{r}
urlb <- "https://usac.climb8a.com/event/6926"

tabb<- read_html(urlb) |> 
  html_nodes("table")
```

```{r}
testb <- tabb[[1]] |> html_table()
testb
```
